properties.title: Niederhorn
properties.abstract: The Gruppenumlaufbahn conveniently takes you up to the Niederhorn - where after a few steps you reach the summit. Here, your eyes meet with stunning panoramic views over the Bernese Oberland.
properties.description: Thanks to the pristine nature of the Niederhorn, rare species of plant and animal life continue to thrive in the area. And it’s not seldom that early risers delight in the sight of ibex, chamois, marmots or even the king of the skies - the Golden Eagle. Another plus for early risers is that, with an early morning "special” ride to the Niederhorn as day breaks, they find themselves among the first visitors of the day … and the advantages of this speak for themselves.
properties.name: Niederhornbahn
